page.title: 02The Beach Family
page.content: There are 3 people in our family: Mum, Dad and myself. I go to bed at 9.30, Mum goes at about 10.30 and Dad goes at 11.00. I get up at about 8.00, Mum gets up at 7.45 and Dad gets up at about 8.30. Saturdays my Dad's up first. I have 7 uncles and aunties and 9 cousins. Auntie Janice and Uncle George live in London so I don't see her very much. She comes up as much as possible to see the family. Uncle George travels to other countries taking orders. He is a representative. My Mum's brother, Uncle John, lives in France and has a son called Gal'Pierre. I have never seen him but I have a photograph. At school I play netball, the recorder and the guitar. I go on holiday with my Mum and Dad except for school trips to France and Hornsea.
